Symbol designates the start of the contribution to the address table.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/asmprinter/addresspool-h/#l00060">60</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/asmprinter/addresspool-h">AddressPool.h</a>.

### HasBeenUsed {#aff75ea30bd4879854218de5fdf29bf78}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="bool llvm::AddressPool::HasBeenUsed = false">
<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/record">Record</a> whether the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/addresspool">AddressPool</a> has been queried for an address index since the last &quot;resetUsedFlag&quot; call.

Used to implement type unit fallback - a type that references addresses cannot be placed in a type unit when using fission.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/asmprinter/addresspool-h/#l00036">36</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/asmprinter/addresspool-h">AddressPool.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>
